data.text: Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa masadai ɠɛɛzu! Eteai ɠoozunɛ,
Tonaɓiingiti ta kpidii ti ɠooliʋɛ ma.
Gizeiti gaa ɠa wuunsu eɠɛ kedoi, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠakala,
Ta ɠɛ unfegi zu, niiti kpein ti nɔkɔsu vololibaiti bu,
Ma wooi ɠa mɛni Siyɔn, ti ɠoozunɛ,
Mazɔlɔɔ, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa ɠa è Anii-Pɛ-Unda eteai kpein maazu,
Wɔiti Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI nɛai wo ʋɛ, à faa ɲɔi wɔinzeɠe!
Telebo nuiti, à ɠoozunɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-faa zu,
